Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory307.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Alright, alright—these should be enough. Can you tell us your classified information already? By the way, isn't this...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Right, I seem to recall... They\'re "red envelopes," aren\'t they?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's correct! You're looking at it—Nanami's secret weapon!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Red envelopes...', 3: '11', 4: "I wasn't expecting this...", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Red envelopes?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "It doesn't really make sense, but we've collected quite a number of them...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Sure you did! Now, the next step of the plan!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And here comes the classified information!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What you didn\'t know is that—their name is "Xi"! I named them myself!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Yep, I named them after their habits!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami was the first one to discover them, so she had the right to name them! Are you jealous?', 4: '3'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Xi aren\'t our enemies! They\'re small "auto-mechanoid" that live underground. And they\'re very timid! They\'ll run on the faintest sound of battle. Y\'know, like... ""POW!"" or "BOOM!", something like that.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But they're also really fond of relaxing celebrations... Anyway, they aren't going to hurt anyone...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "They aren't aggressive—all they do is pretty graffiti. That's why I picked them a name from the database the moment I found them!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '"Xi" in the past was also a small monster, just like them... It hated loud noises, it was a little greedy, and it was an absolute night owl.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'You know so much about such random things...', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And Nanami found them near Lunar New Year! That's why I chose that name!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "As to why we're hunting them down—that's classified information until you've completed the next stage of our plan!", 4: '3'}
{2: "That's cunning...", 3: '29'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Don't stop in the middle of the story!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm also very curious... Nanami, we just have to collect more of the red envelopes, right?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's right! We'll trade!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "You're out of information, aren't you? You're just tricking us into helping you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Karey deary, haven't you learned? We're friends! Be nice to your friend!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What did you think I do? I thought you were in danger, and here I am! Don't push it!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh... Then I'll apologize after our big hunt? I'll do it properly!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I-I don't need your apologies! Just don't stir up any more troubles, alright? Now, get out of my way! I need to go collecting!", 4: '2'}
